articles.description: Nick, 41, had his leg amputated due to complications from coronavirus. His 38-year-old wife said amputating was the tough but necessary call to keep him alive.
articles.content:
Broadway star Nick Cordero's wife Amanda Kloots indicated that when faced with the decision to amputate his leg or risk losing him, it was a no-brainer.
The 38-year-old fitness trainer appeared on the Today show on Monday morning to provide a progress report… [+5404 chars]

articles.description: PRINCE CHARLES gave a subtle nod to a special bride he walked down the isle during a video message to open a temporary coronavirus field hospital in Wales.

articles.title: BBC Bitesize daily lessons: How it works and who is teaching lessons - Wales Online
articles.description: There are more than 150 lessons on offer each week , and they will be available on BBC iPlayer and have a regular slot on BBC Red Button
articles.content:
Famous faces have joined 200 of the UK's top teachers to deliver lockdown lessons for students and parents over the next 14 weeks.
Launched today (Monday, April 20), BBC Bitesize Daily is the biggest education offering in the BBC's history.
